Join our community and start creating the future you want today wherever you find yourself!

item.title: Call For Applications: The Hubert H. Humphrey Fellowship Program
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
The Hubert H. Humphrey Fellowship Program has opened its annual call for applications for the academic year 2023–2024, and the Public Affairs Division of U.S. Mission Ghana is delighted to make the announcement. A Fulbright exchange, the Hubert H. Humphrey Fellowship Program develops leadership skills among foreign professionals who work together to address regional...

The post Call For Applications: The Hubert H. Humphrey Fellowship Program appeared first on The New Vibes.
